page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Maureen Morgan,I am ten years old.First I get up ,put my dressing gown on & go down to have my breakfast,I have cornflakes.Then I go into the bathroom to have a wash & brush my teeth & hair.I put my shoes on & go out to play tennis with my friend.Then I take my dog for a walk down to the Meadows.When I get home I might have to go to the shops.When I come back I might watch television for a while.Then I have my lunch.I may have sandwiches,crisps & a drink of orange.After,my friends come to call & we play games,or we might play with my friend's little sister.Then mum calls me for tea.We have a cooked tea.After tea I stay in & read or watch television.I like reading Roald Dahl,he is a good author.I go to bed at about 9:30 pm & read there until I get tired.
